When you arrived and notified my staff that you now had 4 adults and 1 child (teenagers would be considered adults in this case) they informed you that the room type you booked was too small and would not be suited for your needs. Because we were sold out and had no other room types available we offered to refund your deposit and book you a room in a neighboring hotel that could accommodate your need for a larger room.  My room division manager even walked you to the room and showed you how you may feel a bit cramped considering the number of people you had with you. You declined our offer to relocate and said the room would be fine. Contrary to your review there is ample space under the bunk bed for large suitcases and although this room only has an alcove, not a closet, there is space to hang items and storage for an extra pillow and blanket. In addition there is a credenza with 3 large drawers, and there is a luggage rack that can be set up near the bed for an additional bag. This room is really designed for 2 adults with 2 small children. In the future I would recommend that you be more specific about how many adults and children are traveling with you at the time of the reservation so the hotel can assign the appropriate room type.  Although I understand your reasons, I am sorry to hear that you will not being staying with us on your return trip; I always appreciate an opportunity to be of better service. Had you given us the chance, I know we would have exceeded your expectations.   Respectfully,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: We had a great stay with twin 3 year olds at the Park Vue Inn...though it the rooms aren't modern and the pool is built into the middle of their parking lot, this hotel had everything we needed for a very comfortable stay for a family looking to get the best deal for their bucks.  1. Literally across the street from Disneyland 2. Microwave Oven + good size mini fridge - meant we could microwave food for the kids and save money and the adults could get takeout at closeby restaurants NOT at pricey Disney. 3. HOT BREAKFAST - outside of a Bed and Breakfast, this is the best hot COMPLIMENTARY breakfast I've had at a hotel.  3 waffle machines, eggs, sausages, breakfast potatoes, and choices of cereals and coffees - really great.  Our kids ate well and that fueled a long day at Disney.

I stayed here for 7 days with my 13 year old daughter & my parents. Great location when spending a long day in the parks. Room was average size but no table to have dinner on. Not enough drawer space either. Wasted space in the bathroom where toilet is, looked like they pulled out sink or some plumbing. Would have been nice to have that extra sink for 4. Bring your own hair dryer, the one provided doest work well. I didn't need to blow dry my hair so it was ok for me but mother & daughter didn't like it. Pool was good size but just wish parents kept better eye on small children near ladder & hot tub. Of course that's really not Park Vue's fault & to be expected.  Check in was easy & friendly but check out wasn't the best. I was "undercharged" when checked in by $11 & hope this

I stayed here with family for two weeks in November 2010.  it was inexpensive and perfectly located across from Disneyland.  the included breakfast had a variety of offerings, cereal, waffles, fruit, yoghurt and each day either pancakes or donuts.  the free just baked cookies and bottles of water from the front desk each day were an added bonus.  the place was clean, convenient and friendly.  I would definitely stay here again

Spent 3 nights at the Park Vue with my daughter and 2 children.  The room was very clean, spacious, with all the amenities you may need...microwave, fridge, coffee maker.  There was also a very nice varied hot breakfast offered each morning which sustained us through a late lunch later.  The staff was very helpful and accommodating, no complaints there.  Of course the location is ideal for anyone going across the street to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Just left the Park Vue after 7 nights from August 9th. Having read the mixed reviews before we left and during our stay I can clearly state that there is nothing wrong with this hotel at all. Those who have reviewed it badly.......look to yourself for faults not the hotel. It doesn't have a huge sign outside saying "Hilton" so stop comparing it to that. The rooms are spacious, well equipped and clean. The breakfast is more than most free offerings with hot items changing daily as well as the usual cold fare. We had an issue with our bathroom basin that was reported in the morning and repaired by noon that day. I have no hesitation in recommending this property to anyone. I am a genuine traveller and having read the negative reviews, I think they are from neighbouring properties
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I truly appreciate all of the kind comments and advice you shared with the TA community.    Warm Regards,   Brian DeRose  Director of Operations

Summary: We recently spent 3 nights here while visiting Disneyland.  The hotel is an older hotel, but very clean. Our only complaint was that there was no available electrical outlet behind the desk. When the battery on our computer died, we had to unplug the TV in order to plug it up.  There was an outlet on the wall beside each bed, but the cords wouldn't reach the desk.  Anything we pluged up (phone, computer, camera, etc) had to lay on the bed since there was no table, desk or night stand near the outlet. When we plugged the TV in again, it took about 15 minutes for it to come back on.  But we would definitely stay here again. Nice to be able to just walk across the street to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lee Ann,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and for sharing your experience with the TA community. I value your opinion and your insight as to how we may better our services.  Thank you for choosing the Park Vue Inn. We look forward to your next stay.   Kind Regards,  Brian DeRose  Director of Operations

Summary: Just returned from another stay at the Park Vue Inn. Again it was another successful stay, even more so due to the effort of the staff to locates some lost tickets.  I accidentally dropped my D23 expo tickets and could not locate them anywhere. I checked with the desk and they could not locate them either.  I left and went over to Disneyland but was very upset. I came back later to use the computer in the lobby to purchase more tickets when one of the maintenance men asked me if I had lost something., He had found them on the ground earlier and had tossed them in the trash ( they are not dated so he had no idea that they were valid) He heard me ask the staff again if they had been located. He went into the garbage (eww) and retrieved my tickets for me. He made my whole weekend!
Manager Response: Dear Kat,   Thank you for reviewing our hotel. I am so happy Alex found your tickets! I also really appreciate your kind words. Reviews like yours validate all the hard work my staff puts out each day to provide great guest experiences like yours. We look forward to your next visit and thank you for choosing to stay at the Park Vue Inn.   Warm Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary Heading: 5 stars for location.  Let's be realistic about everything else.
Summary: Let me start by saying that my wife and I both have backgrounds in hospitality management, so this review may seem more critical than most others on TripAdvisor for this hotel.  This hotel is located directly across the street from Disneyland.  Directly across the street.  I could give this hotel 6 stars for location.  The staff was friendly, and the breakfast was decent.  Now let's talk.  This is a motel with exterior entrances. The furniture, room and bathroom is outdated.  The rooms are small.  Our rooms carpet was in serious need of an extraction.  Wearing our socks in the room for an hour resulted in very dirty socks.  Yuk.  Carpeting can be old, but clean.  This was not the case.  My daughters slept in the bunk beds which had noticeable crumbs and other debris accumulated
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,   I can appreciate a keen eye. However, I think your descriptions are a bit extreme and it seems as though you were actively looking for flaws. What I appreciate more is when guests address any issues they have while they are still in the hotel. That gives me and my staff an opportunity to correct anything that may be unsatisfactory right away. Never the less I value your feedback and I have addressed the areas of your concern with my entire housekeeping & maintenance staff. The carpets in our hotel are now 2 years old. Obviously we can’t clean every carpet every day, but every room is steam cleaned at least once every month. I’ve worked hard over the past year to assemble and train a great staff to help me recreate this property. This is not an easy task. We will continue to improve the services and the conditions of our rooms and the overall appearance of the hotel. We have new bedding & drapes arriving at the end of August and all new furniture and fixtures are due to arrive early next year. Hopefully on your next trip to Disney you will consider giving us another chance to be of better service.   Respectfully,   Brian DeRose

Summary: Booked larger 2 roomed suite this time. Rooms were spacious and clean. Glad we paid that little extra for more space.  Again location wise is ideal for Disney. Short walk to and from.  Breakfast was noticeably poorly stocked on this return visit.  Other than that no complaints its our go to hotel for Disney

A second enjoyable stay and we will return. The location is just fantastic, Staff were mostly friendly, house keeping staff were great. Pool towels were restocked quickly when we asked. Breakfast not great but Denny and IHOP are next door. We appreciated the ice cream birthday cake. 2 queen suite was perfect for a family of 5.

We stayed here for 8 nights in the 2 queen/kitchenette suite. The pictures on the PVI website are EXACTLY what the room looks like. Check in was easy and friendly. When I made the reservations back in January, I requested a top floor room and it that is what we got. The suite was very clean when we arrived.The room had 2 queens in a bedroom with a door that closed. The bedroom was very roomy with a long desk, a small table with 2 chairs and a 40" flat screen tv. It also had a huge 8ft closet with mirror doors on it. There was an AC unit it the bedroom which work nicely. The beds had white linens and were extremely clean and comfy! The curtains could be cleaned or updated, they were a bit dirty and yucky. The living room had a loveseat with a pullout bed, a coffee table, flat

Summary Heading: Excelent hotel option for Disney-bound families
Summary: We spent a few days in this hotel this summer of '13, and it's simply the smartest choice for families with children who want to spend a some days in Disney World or Disney California Adventures. The rooms are clean, spacious and with the two double beds and small kitchen/bathroom area we had everything we needed for a night-time small dinner or snack.they have a safe-deposit box right inside the room as well.  The breakfast is included and quite good, and the hotel fees are incredibly cheap given that you only need to cross the street and you are at Disney World!!! It's even closer than Disney's own parking lot!! You can even see the fireworks display at night from your own room window ( or step outside briefly to watch it). Perhaps the only draw-back I can think of is that it

We've stayed at the Park Vue Inn the past few years that we went to Disneyland. Up until this last trip I've raved about how perfect the hotel is. This trip was a bit rough. We required a downstairs room due to a handicap and ability to park an electric wheelchair this year. I made the reservation months in advance and was told I could have a room downstairs to accommodate our needs. Once we checked in, they informed me that they didn't have the downstairs room available. There weren't really options at such short notice so we had to take their upstairs room. It was very hard for my grandmother to make it up the steps. They did offer to move our rooms 2 days into our 3 day stay which would just be more work than benefit at that point. The staff treated me poorly while I was
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I’d like to offer you and your family my sincere apology for your experience. I never like to leave a guest with a negative impression of our hotel or our services. I know that my staff did everything they could to accommodate your family and arrange for you to have a ground floor room. I realize your impression of the situation was vastly different. The difficulty in accommodating your request stems from the specialty room type you required. We only have 4 of those room types (2 up and 2 down). With overlapping reservations on a sold out week we were unable block the room. We offered you another room type on the first floor for the first night and would have been able to relocate you to the ground floor room you booked on the 2nd and 3rd nights of your stay, but you refused the offer.  I realize that it is not ideal to move rooms, but we were trying our best to accommodate your needs. In addition to that we arranged for the safe storage of your mother’s power scooter every night and we did offer compensation for the inconvenience. I have addressed your comments about the bathroom with my maintenance and housekeeping staff and those areas have been corrected. Overall you were unsatisfied with your stay and that is what is disappointing to me. We strive every day to provide exceptional services and accommodations to every guest. Our hope is that your will reconsider giving our hotel another opportunity to be of better service to you and your family.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: We were delighted to be just outside the front gate to get into Disneyland.  This was so convenient and no hassle of waiting for buses and was an easy walk to return to our rooms anytime during the day for a break.  The rooms were very clean and a good size included microwave and decent size fridge. The rate included breakfast. I highly recommend this is you want to be close to the park and no stress of needing extra transportation

Great value place to stay, right opposite the gate to Disneyland.  Clean and comfortable with good breakfast.  We arrived a few hours before check in time and staff were happy to store our bags until we returned a few hours later.  Very helpful staff and always happy to help out. Basic hotel but everything you need for a visit to Disneyland.

This was a great location!  We were able to come back to the hotel during the day if needed.  It was only a 10 minute walk to the gate (with 2 kids in tow).  The pool was fun and the room was clean.  Nothing fancy, but perfect for what we needed.  When we needed towels for the poor, we just called and someone would bring them out immediately.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are currently working on many upgrades to our property. We hope that on your next visit these upgrades will be available for you. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay - Reasonably priced
Summary: We have stayed here Two times and its always been a pleasant stay for a few days at Disneyland. Very Clean and reasonably priced. They have the standard breakfast , Donuts, toast, bagel, cereal, fruit, coffee, juice, milk, muffins.  Beds are comfortable, air cond. works well and pluming is all working as it should.    Sometimes you might hear a noisy family next door, but its pretty quiet most of the time. Of course the location is great being right across the street from the park entrance. The staff was helpful when we needed extra towels or a blanket or just to bring us some extra soap shampoo ect, ect ...... The pool was ok , clean , a little small for us but still ok. We will stay here again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that your stay was pleasant, and thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn once again. Remember our Returning guests get a special rate. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel to be closer to Disneyland than previous visits. The lobby is directly across the street from the park entrance. The hotel was very clean and well maintained, and exactly as advertised. We also found it was more quiet than we expected. Parking was easy, and there are several restaurants nearby if you want to escape theme park food. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to know that your stay was great. Our proximity to the parks are one of our best amenities, but we work hard to provide a clean, confortable, home away from home.  We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We chose to stay at Park Vue this trip following a previously disappointing stay at HoJo's. Park Vue is the perfect location for like minded Disneyland junkies such as our family of 4 ( children aged 8 & 10)l. We arrived from Hawaii on an overnight flight and will be eternally grateful that a room was available within 40mins ( 8:30am) so we could grab a few hours rest. We had an upstairs room at the back which kept noise to a minimum, the only disturbance being young children running to breakfast in the mornings ( outside the control of Park Vue). Room size was more than adequate, beds were large and comfortable and our room was serviced daily. Yes there is room for some upgrading, but it was nothing major enough to impact on our experience. The pool looked more than adequate,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It is always our goal to provide the highest level of customer service to all of our guests. We thank you for your kind words, and also for choosing Park Vue Inn as your hotel. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 nights while visiting Disneyland and were so impressed-we're still talking about it! I had wanted to stay here last year but they were booked so I was so excited to stay this year. You can't beat the location right across the street from the Disneyland entrance.The hotel had large rooms, super clean and nicely updated decor and comfy beds. Free breakfast was so convenient to grab a quick bite and get over to the parks asap. We enjoyed being able to come back to the room in the afternoon for a swim and a rest before going back to the park in the evening. A great value all around and great experience. We will absolutely stay at the Park Vue from now on and recommend highly!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to have been able to provide a perfect stay for you and your family. We will continue to work hard to provide a great place for all of our guests. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn, we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Free parking, great breakfast, quiet rooms
Summary: When looking for hotels in the Disneyland area, it is easy to overlook a few seemingly minor details, but details do add up.  The Park Vue Inn is very close to the crosswalk that takes you over to the Disney theme parks (Disneyland and California Adventure).  Literally, it is maybe 10 feet from this crosswalk.  Having a shorter walk in the mornings when you're trying to get to the park quickly or in the evenings when you're dog tired makes such a difference.  If you have little ones or retired folks with you, having the ability to quickly and easily come back to the motel for naps and rest during busy/hot times of the day is wonderful.  This visit at the Park Vue (our first in 2-3 years) we had one 2 queen room and another room with two queens, a sofa pullout and a kitchenette.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that your stay was great. We strive to provide the highest level of customer service to all of our guests. We will continue to work on our property to better accommodate our guests. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn as your hotel we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is the second time I stayed here.  I was pleasantly surprised to see upgrades have been made to the rooms.  Carpets were changed since the last time we stayed there 2 years ago which left the soles of my feet black and I'm not exaggerating!  Rooms had a cleaner look and feel.  The bathroom seemed bigger and brighter.    They did away with the welcome baskets.  Which was nice touch but not necessary.  And between my friends and I the hotel staff always had the baskets labeled with the wrong names anyway which made you feel you were in someone else's room.  Overall a good stay and will continue to book here if I'm in the Anaheim area.  Staff seemed helpful and courtesy.  And the convenience/access to Disneyland can't be beat!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have upgraded many things and will continue to upgrade our property. It is always our goal to provide a great place to stay. We are glad that you noticed the new upgrades. Thank you for being a loyal customer, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: After looking at Disney properties, we found the Park Vue Inn.  All in, for park tickets and hotel, Disney was going to charge us more than $3,000 more to stay at its hotel than it cost us to stay at the Park Vue Inn for 3 nights.  And the Park Vue is directly across the street from the entrance to Disneyland.  The front desk staff is outstanding.  In addition to being friendly, they  arranged for bag storage on the days we checked in/out, and transportation; they gave us cookies and lemonade; and made helpful suggestions.  The breakfast is complimentary and was standard fare, but good (waffles, cereals, yogurt, and a variety of hot foods like eggs, biscuits and gravy, sausage, etc).  The rooms were a bit dated, and were a little noisy.  But being able to get up and walk across
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review and sharing your experience. We are pleased that you found great value, quality, service and convenience in our accommodations. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Park Vue Inn. We hope you will stay with us again on your next visit to Disney.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose  Director of Operations

Summary: We were here for 4 nights.  We knew we were not going to be able to compare to a hotel on Disney property, but I would never stay here again.   I have stayed in many older hotels that are very clean, and I am happy with that.   This hotel is old and just raking in the money but not doing anything with it.  I have to say the sheets and towels were clean, but the ceramic tile floors were very slippery like a greasy kitchen with shoes on, and the grout in many areas of the floor and shower were black. The tracks the closet doors slid on were full of crud, the refrigerator was dirty on the outside.  The window in the shower was grungy and the screen was caked with dirt.  The shower curtain was ripped, and the rod looked like it had been patched back in place.  The toilet had
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,   Please except my sincere apology for the unacceptable conditions you found your guest room in. I would like you to know that every concern you reported has been repaired. The rooms division manager and the maintenance manager have completed an audit of all guest rooms to ensure these conditions are not present in any other guest rooms. I can assure you we are not “raking in the money and not spending it on the property” On the contrary we are in a continued phase of improvement.  Additionally I’d like to clarify that yes the breakfast room is very busy and the fresh fruit is very popular; however the breakfast room attendants do their best to replenish everything as quickly as possible. We order enough food to feed every guest every day. I am truly sorry you had this experience. I only wish you would have asked to speak to me before leaving the property, so I could have had an opportunity to address and correct your concerns right then and there.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: This hotel is fabulous for Disneyland. The breakfast is great although very crowded. The rooms were ok for the price. The location is the best. I had booked & paid in full 3 months earlier requesting two queens (hotel website offers "Room Chooser" & "Download Room Floorplans" document) but on arrival only to find we were given a Double & Bunks. On enquiry I was informed that I had "Probably booked thru a 3rd party (Hotels.com) & "Availibility" Also it sounded like a herd of baby elephants lived upstairs.
Manager Response: We value your opinion and thank you for your review. We wish to offer you an apology for what seems to be an error in the booking of your room type. We are aware of the noise transfer from the second floor and we are addressing this concern. Thank you for choosing our hotel. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great location, nice room, good value
Summary: The location of the Park Vue cannot be beat...just across the street from the main gate.  We were a group of four women visiting Disneyland.  They gave us two adjoining rooms, each with two queens, on the ground floor about half way back.  The rooms had all we needed, good beds, hot showers, refrigerators for snacks, and plenty of room for us and our belongings.  Everything was clean.  We had breakfast from the included buffet daily.  The food is not gourmet, but it was tasty and there was a good choice of items, with a variety of selections on the four days we were there.  We used the Jacuzzi a couple of nights after we returned from the park, it was nice that it was open later so we could enjoy it.  I am returning to Disney later this year and will choose the Park Vue again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to write your review. Sounds like you had a great get away with great friends. We are thrilled that you chose to stay with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Right opposite the entrance to Disney this motel is an excellent choice for families since you can go back to your room for a break whenever you want. We are a family of 4 and chose a room with an extra lounge area which gave us a lot more space. Full kitchen facilities and there is a supermarket close by so plenty of options for dining in or out. Breakfast was included and was average but still a good deal. Free parking whereas other hotels close by charge $20 a day. The rooms are great, though nothing flash but you are hardly in them when you are there to visit Disney..They are spacious and beds are comfortable (I found the pillows quite hard). Hotel staff really friendly and helpful. They gave us a much cheaper rate for the 5 daypark passes into Disney/SeaWorld and Universal
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so thrilled that you and your family had a great visit. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Park Vue Inn. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Our family of five have just stayed here in two rooms for three nights on the ground level. The rooms are clean and the bed is very comfortable. My only issue was you can hear the people above you moving around in their room,which at midnight was a problem for me. Also had someone knocking on our door at midnight looking for friends. Not impressed at all. The location is fabulous just across the road from the main entrance of Disneyland. I would stay again but would request a room on the upper level.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and feedback. Sharing your experience helps us to better our services. We are addressing the issue of noise transfer and hopefully by your next visit we will have that all sorted out. We look forward to your next stay at the Park Vue Inn. Thank you for choosing our hotel.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose  Director of Operations

Summary: We stayed at the Park Vue Inn while visiting Disney.  The walk to Disney from the hotel is less than five minutes.  It is literally across the street, and offers free parking for guests.  The hotel rooms are not fancy, but we were not staying there to enjoy the room.  There is free breakfast, and the hotel provided a fruit basket for us in our room.    The pool was not working while we were there, but they had an agreement with another hotel for us to use their pool which the kids enjoyed.  We would definitely stay at this hotel again.  The staff was nice, and rooms were clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have made some changes since July 2012, all for the better. We have made these changes, and upgrades to better accommodate all of our guests. We hope that you could visit soon to enjoy our new amenities and changes to our property.

Summary: I have stayed here before in 2004 and loved its proximity to Disneyland so booked there again. Very helpful staff at reception, gave us maps and directions for places we wanted to go. Got a really good rate on taxi service to our next hotel ( cheaper than any I had been able to get quotes for on the net) Our room was perfect for us - I was travelling with my mum and my 14yo son - we had 2 queen beds and a pull out sofa- beds were comfortable and clean. There was a small kitchenette which enabled us to stock up at the supermarket and do some self catering which helped our budget. The rooms are dated and a bit musty ( we just opened the window and aired it out)  but really you're not here apart from sleeping and getting cleaned up. Breakfast was basic but you could pull together
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We will continue to work on our property and service to better accommodate our guests. The proximity is one of our best amenities, but we will continue to update our rooms and property. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary: The perfect location for a visit to Disney.  We returned to our room during each day for a freshen up, and then continued with our Disney experience.  The staff were very efficient and friendly, full of helpful advice.  The rooms are basic, but our room was clean, everything worked as it should.  The bathroom, even though it is old, was clean and functional. The breakfast was simple but it did the job.  There was always ample food whenever we were there. There are many restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.  The bus stop is in front of the hotel and our shuttle from LAX dropped us at the door. This was our third visit to this hotel and we will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  It is always great to know that your stay was perfect. We are currently working on small but needed upgrades to our property. We hope that you would come visit again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary Heading: Quaint, comfortable, great value and perfectly located.
Summary: We were visiting Anaheim and Disneyland for the first time and booked a 7 day stay at the Inn. We had purchased a 5 day park hopper pass and wanted to do some LA sight-seeing as well. We chose the Inn on the basis of location and Trip Advisor reviewers’ comments and we were not disappointed.  We did not have a car and the location was just perfect. The Inn is quaint and old. It looks as though it was one of the original hotels built when Disneyland first got underway. Our upstairs room was a good size and even though the décor was dated the furnishings were adequate, the beds comfortable and  the bathroom area spacious.  The included breakfast was more than adequate to satisfy most people and the outside dining area would be a plus in busy times.  All of the staff were friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are thrilled that your stay was great. It is always our goal to provide a clean, comfortable, and affordable, home away from home.  Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn as your hotel, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and affordable stay for trip to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms were basic, but comfortable and clean.  We had a small problem with the TV, but a hotel employee, Tim, came to fix the connection quickly.  He was polite and professional as he resolved the problem.  We'd be happy to stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our hotel. We are happy that your stay was great. We have shared this review with Tim, and he expresses his gratitude. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: After reading some of the negative reviews I kind of regretted booking here. However, once we arrived we realized how good it is if you plan on doing Disney with the family. Yes, it can be noisy. Yes, the rooms are small.  Yes, it's an older motel. However....breakfast was good, the location for park access perfect, and the room was clean. Unlike others who complained of the big palm bugs, none were in our room (we were on the second floor).  Also, those big bugs aren't really a big deal.  Some people just need to relax a bit.   The housekeeping staff and service was good.  There was one housekeeping staff member that made our stay especially memorable, Nelida.  She took extra Good care of us and our family appreciated her. Oh...and just a reminder, tip your housekeeping staff
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to know that your stay was great. We thank you for all your kind words. We have also shown this review to the housekeeper, she expresses her gratitude. We will continue to work hard to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable home away from home. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here 4 nights for our disney trip in the first week of June. Unbeatable location! Easy walk to Disneyland right across street. Good for family have young kids. Don't expect anything fancy here! The furniture in the room are kinda old. It's a very basic place for sleep and shower.  Free continental breakfast every morning before head to the park is a plus. The pool and hot tub area is very clean and quiet. Its awesome to hangout at the hot tub after a long day at the park.  Overall good stay!
Manager Response: We are very happy that your stay was great. The hot tub and pool area have recently been refinished. Thank you for your review. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay on a budget- very close to parks!
Summary: We have stayed here 3 times now & love it!  Always call the hotel directly to get the best rate.  Once you have stayed there, you can qualify for the past guest rate which is usually about $20 off the lowest rate.  I think this hotel is actually a closer walk to the parks than the Disneyland Hotel or Paradise Pier.  It is right across the street from the entrance!  The breakfast is free and better than most free breakfasts around here.  They have a make your own waffle station, eggs, breakfast potatoes and sausage or bacon.  Also toast & bagels!  Can't beat the nice outdoor seating too.  We love that they offer rooms with bunk beds.  Perfect for kids who don't do well sharing a queen!  While is is a little older, the rooms were clean and the beds are comfortable!  There really
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We will continue to do our best to provide a home away from home to all of our guests. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary: It's really noisy.  Every morning we would wake up to the noise of other hotel guests.  Breakfast is filling but marginal in quality. It's ironic that we are in California but they hardly served any fruits for breakfast.  They never refill the fruit bowl.  Maids don't replenish the toilet paper.  Had to go to the front desk to ask for more.  One time, they actually did not supply us with any washcloths.  They do tidy up the room, but for the most part, I've seen better housekeeping services in other hotels.  Housekeeping is kind of neglectful here.  The front desk people are kind and helpful, though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Please know that we have spoken to the departments mentioned. We will continue to work diligently at providing the best experience for all of our guests. We apologize that your stay was not excellent. We hope that you would allow us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: We just returned from our trip to the USA.  We stayed at the Park Vue Inn, which was great.  It is right across the road from Disneyland which was convenient for us after doing 12 hours a day there, We occupied two queen beds with bunks room, the decor was lovely, as it was only a room to sleep at the end of the day.  The beds were made every day for us.  Plus you got breakfast every morning, simple foods really, but saves you a lot on buying breakfast with your stay. Can not fault this hotel.  We would highly recommend it to anyone wanting to stay close to Disneyland.  We would definitely stay there again if we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are very grateful for your review. We know our proximity is one of our best amenities, but we work very hard to provide a great place to stay. It has been our goal to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable home away from home. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Well, it's close to Disneyland at least...
Summary: We had room 206.   Good points: It was clean.  It is so close to Disneyland it's a mere 5 minute walk to get to it.  It's so close that you can also watch the nightly 9:30 fireworks from the balcony.  If you get to breakfast right when it starts, it's a good selection of food.  Friendly staff!  Bad points: The room is really small.  For our family of 4, the "queen" bed (I think it was really just a double bed) and the bunk beds crammed into this tiny room really didn't allow us to rest as we would have liked.  In my opinion, they should renovate and just make each room the size of 2, raise their prices, and have less families at one time stay there, making the rooms more comfortable for the families that travel there.  The toilet paper roll was located across from the toilet and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for your stay being anything less then great. We will take this and all reviews to help us improve our property. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn, and we hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a Disney trip
Summary: If Disneyland is your destination, you will not find a better place to stay for the price. It is right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. Easy walking distance, even with small children in the group and the parking at the hotel is free. It also has an amazing view of the fireworks at night without having to stay at the park if your little ones tire out early.  There is also a good selection of restaurants on the street to either side of the hotel, so it was not difficult at all to find a place we could all agree on. It is also easy enough to leave the parks, eat across the street near the hotel, and go backto theparks afterwards if you want to save abit of money on the food prices. In addition, your room key will get you a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy that your stay was great. It is our goal to make every visit a great one. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Been here before, but don't know if I will come again
Summary: I stayed here on May 23-25 for the 24 hour bender at the Disney Park. When we checked in they offered us the room next to the morning breakfast area, we asked if they could move us they checked and told us no. We got to the room dropped off our stuff and went to the park for a quick bite. When we came back around 10:30pm the TV would not turn on. Called front desk and they told us maintenance had left for the day, but the guy from the front desk came to our room and about 15-20 minutes later was able to turn on the TV, turns out someone had unplugged something in the back.   Finally went to bed got up at 5am went into the bathroom and a BIG cockroach was in there. Thank goodness I had not unpacked everything in the bathroom so nothing was crawled upon. I wish I had taken a
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I would like to offer my sincere apology for leaving you with the impression that my staff was not of better service.  I spoke to my room’s manager and chief engineer and their records show that your concerns were addressed in a very prompt and thorough manner and they found no evidence of your complaint. Our housekeeping department follows very specific criteria to ensure that our guest rooms are cleaned thoroughly each day.  Regarding your checkout; according to the housekeeping list we did offer you a late checkout, so I apologize that that was not communicated to you correctly. We truly do strive every day to provide the best possible conditions that will enhance our guest’s experience. Hopefully you will reconsider your decision and give our hotel another chance to be of better service on your next visit.   Sincerely,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: Great location across from the main gate into Disney! Beds and small and hard... But not too bad. Hotel needs some updating but you can't beat the location and free breakfast, which isn't bad. They even have a waffle maker!

First time we stayed in this location. It was fabulous being so close to the main gate. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean.   He have stayed at the Disneyland Resort several times and it just isn't worth  the extra amount.  This motel had plenty of parking, free breakfast and excellent location.   If others want resort amenities they should pay the $300 + to stay in the resorts and leave the rooms available for those that appreciate the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel. We are so happy you found exactly what you were looking for: location, service, comfort and value. We appreciate your business and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights at this property during our recent visit to Disneyland. I won't consider this any luxury stay, but it is clean and comfortable. Very near to Disneyland and it has many eateries around. Can even see Fireworks from our room. Breakfast simple but adequate. Having coin laundry in the property is really great.  However, the room had a stale smell that is pretty disturbing and the air con is quite noisy. And with the gym closing at 10pm makes working out at night quite difficult.  But with the reasonable pricing and very helpful front desk, it's really value for money. If getting a decent stay with close proximity to Disneyland  is all you need. Then this is the place for you.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am so happy you found our hotel staff to be helpful and that your stay was enjoyable overall. Please accept our apology for the minor issues you experienced in your guest room. We take all comments as a way to improve our product and service. The issues you mentioned have been addressed and corrected. We hope on your next visit you’ll choose our hotel again and we look forward to the opportunity to be of service.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: I surprised my kids with a trip to Disney for Spring Break.  I had to do my research on the down-low so I couldn't use Facebook to ask friends for recommendation.  Solely using TripAdvisor - I booked 4 nights at the Park Vue Inn.  I could not have been happier with our selection.  The hotel is located right near the light to cross over to the parks.  The rooms are very comfortable. A large fridge, microwave & coffee maker make storing snacks and reheating leftovers so convenient.  The breakfast was more then adequate for a quick bite before the parks.  The Cold Stone connected to the hotel gives guests a small discount.  The only downside was the noise in the breezeway but once the air conditioning clicked on - it wasn't an issue.  Next time I'll just bring ear plugs.  The staff
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,   Surprise trips to Disney are always a great idea and are always well received. I’m glad your family had such a great time.  I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us based solely on your research; that means a great deal to me. My staff and I work every day to provide great service that translates into great guest experiences. Thank you for sharing your experience with other travelers; we look forward to your next stay with us.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary Heading: Across the street from the park
Summary: As noted in all the other reviews, right across the street from the entrance to Disneyland Resort, as they call it now.  The beds were comfortable, and the frequent hum of the air conditioner provided good white noise.  With the noisy kids next door - the walls are thin - the sound was appreciated.  The management seems to do a good job keeping it quiet after 10pm.   We could see the fireworks from our bedroom window, which on day three was appreciated.  The pool and spa were fine, with towels plentiful at the pool.      The facilities, though old, were clean.  All in all, it is a good place to spend the evening with your family after visiting the park.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,   Thanks for taking the time to share your review. When you’re right across the street from both parks and you can see the entrance, it’s that much harder to for parents to contain the excitement children experience and express. I am happy you found a way to block out some of the laughter and excitement your neighbors were sharing. I am glad you were able to enjoy the fireworks from our property and that you took the time to relax by our pool. Thanks again for your comments and suggestions, we hope you choose to stay with us again.    Warm Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Hotel was clean.  Location in relation to Disneyland was awesome.  They let us park for free in the lot until midnight the day we checked out.  This hotel was a very good value for the dollar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We will continue to do our best to provide a clean and confortable place to stay. It is always our goal to provide the highest level of customer service. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary: I just spent 3 nights at this hotel while visiting Disneyland with a friend.  We stayed in a room with 2 queen beds.  The beds were awesome, very comfortable.  There was very little noise and we never got woken up.  The air conditioner worked, there was a little coffee maker, free breakfast with waffles, bacon, biscuits and gravy, hard boiled eggs, cereal, bagels and all kinds of stuff.  The staff was nice and we asked for a wake up call which we did get.  They sell tickets there for 5$ less than at the gates.  The owner arranged for a driver to pick us up early Saturday morning to get us to the airport (same price as taxi and much nicer ride).  There is a little store in the hotel that sells drinks, snacks and sundries of all kinds.  There was a pool that looked nice but we did
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you as our guests. We thank you for your kind words. We hope to have another opportunity to be of service to you and your family. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary: We stayed at Park Vue for six days in May.  We were thrilled at the location and access to Disneyland!  It made our vacation so much easier...the entry to the park is right across the street.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  We enjoyed having the full breakfast each morning and the rooftop seating.   Pool was nice, it was nice to be able to walk back to the hotel during the heat of the day, use the pool to cool off, then go back to the park.   The rooms were clean, nothing fancy but everything we needed with a small fridge, microwave and comfortable beds.   However, there was a lot of noise when we were trying to get to sleep at night...we were on the bottom floor and walls were very thin.  Will request an upper floor next time.  Appreciated that we could store our luggage
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We will continue to work hard, to provide the best service possible to all of our guests. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is  a hotel(motel) for the family who wants to walk to Disney, crash at night and eat basic breakfast fare. It's clean, but very basic. The furniture is dated and the a/c is a loud wall unit. Once breakfast begins, expect little kids running up and down the walkway and a very crowded breakfast room. We were trying to save money, which we did. Was it worth the savings? Not to us!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We apologize that your stay was anything less than great. It is always our goal to provide the highest level of customer service, and a clean, confortable, home away from home. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn and hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: First, let me say, had I written this review one year ago, I would have given 3-4 stars for great location and a satisfactory room.  However, this year, on the first night of my visit, I spun the toilet paper roll and a HUGE cockroach fell out and ran across the bathroom floor.  I did manage to kill it (although it was very fast) and I checked the room for more, but didn't find any.  I tried to convince myself that it might have been an isolated incident and that it might have come in with the maid service.  The next morning, my friend, staying in the room next door, told me that she, also, found a large cockroach in her room.  We reported it to the front desk, but they weren't very concerned and told us they were "palm bugs" that lived in the palm trees surrounding the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I’d like to address your review as it connects to the review of another guest from your party who posted the same complaint. Your account of this event and the frequency of your friend’s discoveries are inaccurate. I find it upsetting that you posted this after the great effort my staff made to address and correct this issue. We did relocate a member of your party to another room in house as you requested and the members that were not willing to move rooms were relocated to a neighboring hotel. A sincere apology and full compensation were given and you spoke directly with my room’s division manager and chief engineer as they were inspecting & servicing your room. When they couldn’t find anything you said everything was okay and you thanked them for their efforts. Then you shared a long story about how the guest’s from your party we relocated were over reacting. Hearing that and now seeing this post completely puzzles me. I’m not sure why you decided to tell only one side of the story, but I hope I can set the record straight. Contrary to your claims, we did have Eco Lab inspect and service those rooms the following day and they did not find evidence of any pests. I’m not sure what happened on your way home to change your mind, but when you left my lobby you seemed okay with the resolution we provided. I realize that some of your other family members were very upset with the circumstances; however we exercised great care and compassion in our efforts to remedy this situation. I stand by my staff’s efforts to respond, assist and deliver the appropriate solution.   Sincerely,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: We as a family of 10 coming from Australia have stayed at the Park Vue Inn on 8 different occasions, in nearly all the different rooms they offer and would go back in a heart beat, our last stay was in November 2012 and once again the stay, staff, and housekeeping was great, We tell everyone visiting not to go past for location, rooms available, breakfast and parking all included in price. Love it and we will return again
Manager Response: Hello Meredith, thank you for your review. We thank you for being loyal guests. We strive to provide a home away from home for all of our guests. Thank you for choosing Park Vue, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed here for the first time and loved it. We traveled with 2 young kids and it was there first time going to Disneyland. We were able to go back to the room and rest and then go back to Disneyland later. The kids loved the bunk beds. It was clean and stuff was very friendly. Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to know that your stay was great. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn as your hotel. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: DISCUS TING!  I am shocked and appalled.  We stayed with our 3 children in May 2013.  I am also 6 months pregnant.  We came back from Disneyland to shower the kids and put them to bed.  We walked into the bathroom only to find the BIGGEST ROACH! Shocking!  My 5 year old cried her eyes out after it ran accross her feet. She refused to sleep there one more night.  We went to the front desk and spoke with the clerk, she said, sorry, not much I can do about. it!  WHAT!???  I checked out that night and found a room down the street.  When I went in and spoke with the manager, he said "well its not acceptable, but what do you want me to do about it?  He refunded my money for the night, but not without a rude attitude.  I WOULD NEVER stay there again. It really made our trip quite
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I would like to take this opportunity to extend an additional apology to you and your family. However, I need to set the record straight. This review is disappointing for me to read considering that my staff was very accommodating by all accounts including those from guests that witnessed my staff trying to resolve this situation. I offered you a full refund based on the account of your experience documented by my staff and made that decision before I spoke to you.  I don’t recall you threatening me with anything in any way.  I am truly sorry your daughter was upset to the point of you wanting to check out of the hotel. We offered to move you to another room that same night and you declined, so my staff phoned a neighboring hotel for you to arrange a reservation. When you returned to the hotel the following day you received a full refund and a very sincere apology from me. In addition to your refund I treated your family to Cold Stone Ice Cream as a show of good faith that I truly desired to make this situation right. You thanked me and mentioned that “you weren’t trying to get something for free.”  I’m not sure how or when I was being rude; after all you agreed that the refund I offered you was fair. The day after your encounter we had Eco Lab inspect that room and the nearby rooms and they did not find evidence of any pests. They treated the immediate and surrounding areas as a precaution. Please know that we strive every day to provide a level of customer service that is second to none. Our goal is to make every guest experience a great one. I know you said you won’t return, but if you do, we’ll be here ready to be of service.   Sincerely,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: We stayed for one night with one couple and two adult children. The location cannot be beat! Directly across the street. The first day we had to park at Disney. Cost us $15. Second day, after spending the night at Park Vue, we were able to park at the motel. Walk to the motel was closer than the parking garage at Disney! With taxes and all we paid about $184.00. I thought it was a bit much for the quality of the motel, but it did include parking which saved us $15, and they serve breakfast which saved us time. There is an IHOP right next door. It is a motel, where the doors of the rooms go directly outside. We were on the second level so we struggled to get our suitcases upstairs, so older folks beware. The place was clean, but it is old. The heat/AC unit was in the rear window
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize that your stay was anything less than great. It is our goal to always exceed our guest’s expectations. We will continue to work diligently to insure all of our guests have a great experience. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn we hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Great Motel… but it’s a MOTEL (There are some ADA issues too)
Summary: If you go into this thinking “I’m staying at a motel”, then you won’t be surprised when you see it. And those in a wheelchair who might need assistance might want to head somewhere else; unless you have and are willing to be helped.   It is an older, smaller complex that has new paint, newer carpets, beds, and bedding. The rooms are not huge, but fit your need, if that need is to just have somewhere to sleep, shower, and get going again. The parking lot is tight and can be tricky to navigate if you have a big car, and sometimes the crowds walking along the street make it hard to even turn into the lot.   The biggest plus for this motel is its location; literally across the street from Disneyland’s main entrance, thus the crowds on the street. It is also close to several
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We thank you for addressing these concerns. We will use this review to help us better our accommodations. We will continue to work hard to create a home away from home for all of our guests. Thank you again; we hope that you would give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: We stayed at the Park Vue Inn for 6 nights.  It was great to have the breakfast included as food prices in parks are very expensive.  The location couldn't have been better.  There were 5 of us, 3 adults and 2 kids in adjoining rooms which was great.  We found the staff, everyone from reception to cleaners very friendly and helpful.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We thank you for your kind words. We strive to provide the highest level of customer service to all of our guests. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This was the second time I stayed at the Park Vue Inn and it did not disapppoint.  The location can't be beat if you are going to Disneyland or California Adventure -- it is literally across the street from the entrance to the parks.  The room was clean and comfortable.  The microwave and mini fridge are a big plus.  The only minor complaint I would have is that the bathroom has a sort of musty smell -- there was a window but it had no screen so if you are like me you probably don't want to open it for fear of bugs flying in.  The walls are pretty thin and you can hear people walking about...especially if you are on the first floor so if that bothers you maybe ask for a room on the 2nd floor.  We did not try the free breakfast but there are plenty of eateries in the immediate
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing our hotel. We appreciate the feedback on the bathroom and have already addressed and corrected the issue. Thanks for making us your preferred hotel. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I stayed at the Park Vue with my huband and daughter for 14 nights in a row (last summer) and I have nothing but good things to say about my stay. We enjoyed the location, the friendly staff, the service, the pool area, the breakfast and the price! It was the second time that I have stayed at the Park Vue and I will do so again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We strive to provide the highest level of customer service and we're happy you had a great stay. We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Just got back from 3 days in Anaheim. As always  the Park Vue delivered great service, clean rooms and a good place to stay.   I stay at the Park Vue any time I am going to Disneyland and the location can't be beat. The breakfast is pretty good; eggs, bacon, bagels, toast, waffles, juice, coffee, cereal and yogurt. Not bad for free plus free parking.   Not a fancy place but a good place to lay your head after all day at the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose our hotel. We really appreciate your business and thank you for your kind words. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: What a great find!  The location was amazing for a decent price.  We were given a courtesy call to make sure everything was good and they asked if we needed anything.  I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. It is always our goal to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable home away from home. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: So nice to be right across the street from the park.
Summary: The Park Vue Inn is right across the street from the main entrance to Disneyland. They offer free parking, a pool (which we did not use), cookies & coffee in the lobby, and a free breakfast from 7 - 10 a.m. We were there two nights, the room was comfortable, clean and we slept very well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that your stay was great. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary Heading: Great location but NO ROOM SERVICE?
Summary: We stayed at the Park Vue Inn Anaheim, CA for four nights (4/17/13 to 4/22).  The hotel is nice, the location is right across the street from the East entrance of Disneyland.  The walk is about 5 minutes to the front gate...perfect location.  The room was nice with a jacuzzi tub and decently decorated.  Breakfast was typical free breakfast fare...fake eggs, thin bacon, gray sausage, biscuits & gravy, and hash browns plus the not bad, but not great...it was acceptable.  The main reason for the Terrible rating was the total lack of room service.  Each day we returned from the park in the mid afternoon (about 3pm) to find our room uncleaned.  First day, no big deal.  Called and spoke with Wendy and was told they would send someone up before 5 PM.  Returned at 11 PM and the room was
Manager Response: Dear Al K,   I would like to extend a sincere apology for your experience. Although no excuse will suffice we did look into this and I can assure you that this won’t happen again. The room’s manager and the housekeepers assigned to that area would also like to extend an apology for this mishap. Should you change your mind, we would gladly take an opportunity to be of better service to you on your next trip.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose  Director of operations

Summary Heading: Park Vue Inn A Very Good Stay
Summary: I would recommend this place for a family to stay.  It is reasonably priced, the rooms are small but clean and include small fridge, small microwave, coffee maker and they include a free breakfast.  The rooms are not spacious but adequate to crash after enjoying a day at Disneyland.  The Park Vue is directly across from the Disneyland entrance so it is very, very convenient  to get to the park quickly.  One of the other pluses to consider with the reasonable price of room is that parking is free and you can keep your car parked there while you go and spend your day at Disneyland.  A very good deal in my opinion.  If we do return to Disneyland I will come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that your stay was good. We do have larger rooms available like our two room suites, but they do sell fast. Thank you so much for choosing Park Vue inn. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed in room 139 four nights.  We were traveling as grandparents with our children and their children in another room.  Since we flew into Anaheim having a room literally across the street from the main Disneyland entrance was much appreciated.  However there are other properties a few hundred feet away--they just cost a lot more!  Our room had two double beds in a 20' X 16' living area with a 37 " flat screen, an anteroom with sink, mini-fridge, microwave and coffee pot, and a separate room for commode, tub and shower.  Overall the room was in good repair.  When there are strollers and children there will be minor marks on the door frames and a spot of jelly(?) on the carpet, but the room was clean despite the minor markings.  The beds were firm, good linens, towels were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate your kind words and detail. We are very happy that your stay was great. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We travelled with 2 children, 16 & 12, I am glad I booked two queens and bunk room, we were able to put our bags on the bottom bunk. The rooms were clean and beds very comfortable. Staff were all friendly and pleasant.  We were right down the back and did not get any traffic noise, more noise from people walking around upstairs, Breakfast was good, our boys enjoyed making waffles.  The motel was great for visiting Disneyland, you could go back to your room and have a rest during the afternoon and go back for the evening shows.  We didn't have a car, however, because of the location we were within walking distance of plenty of restaurants.  Will recommend to anyone travelling to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that your stay was great. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: "Fantasitic Hotel, Unbelievable value, Clean and Comfortable "
Summary: We stayed at the Park Vue Inn for 14 nights during March 2013 and was instantly delighted with the close proximity to Disneyland it simply doesn't get any better on Harbor Blvd and cant be beaten. While the property is not a five star this hotel it does offers incredible value for money in terms of convenience, comfort, cleanliness and awesome friendly service from all the staff. Small things can make all the difference while your not at home so we really appreciated   * Free in room WIFI access * Free Parking for our hire car * Free In Room Safe * Free In room coffee machine * Free In room Microwave * Access to Free Ice Machine  * Quality Pillow Top Mattress bedding with superior linen (Definitely no bed bugs "great sleep") * In Room range of varying size pillows and spare
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We thank you for your kind words and detail. We are very happy that your stay was great. It is always our goal to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable home away from home. Thank you again, we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Location -- More than worth the $$
Summary: Stayed at the Park Vue for 6 nights while attending a cheer competition followed by a Disney visit. The hotel is within walking distance of Disney (across the street), the Convention Center and numerous restaurants in all cost ranges.The staff is friendly and helpful -- nice to have 24 hour coffee in the lobby! Complimentary breakfast was nice to have and always with ple nty of food. Our grandchildren appreciated the 2 room suite with plenty of room to unwind at the end of a long day. This would be our hotel of choice for any future visits to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing Location and a Great Deal for the Money
Summary: This accomodation is bargain price!  Its literally right across the street from Disneyland and fun fact:  Actually closer to Disneyland Park than the 3 Disney hotels are!  The price is cheap and its a budget hotel; you can't beat it.  However the walls are extremely thin.  The staff mentioned to me that they do have people complaining about kids being excited in other rooms and yelling in the morning (as small children do, because they are so excited) we heard it too.  But you get free breakfast everyday and dinner/snack time on most days.  Its clean and right in front of the only crosswalk in front of Disneyland.  The staff were good too.  It has an ice cream store right in front of it also.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to know that your stay was great. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn.

Summary Heading: So Close you can feel it
Summary: How excellent is the location.  Situated right at the pedestrian crossing to cross the road into main gate Disneyland.  A short walk across the road to Disneyland and Adventure Land and Downtown Disney.  Perfectly located for a Disney Holiday with Cold stone and iHop next to reception, with convenience stores and other eateries all within a short walk.  Check in was quick and simple. Our room had two queen beds for the four of us.  The room was big enough.  Cable television and good internet access.  A small kitchenette and separate bathroom. A little noisy when people walked along the path outside the room.  Breakfast was busy, a scramble to get to the hot waffles.  Hot eggs, sausage and bacon was supplied but was not very good at all.  Cereal and breads also available but not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We thank you for your kind words and suggestions. We will utilize your review to help us improve our amenities to all of our future guests. Thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Super basic property with an exceptional location across the road from Disneyland.  Rooms very very basic, but clean and tidy.  Reception staff very professional and helpful.  The walls and floors are thin, so request a room on the second floor so you don't hear folks walking (or running) in the rooms above you.  Beds strangely high - I am 6ft, and my feet could not touch the floor when sitting on them.  Forget the breakfast - a nutritional wasteland of 100% packaged food including a some mysterious cardbord substance shaped like cartoon bacon and egg patties from the microwave - vile.  Fairly expensive for what you get, but the location can't be beat.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We will use your review and others to help us keep improving our hotel.  We hope to be able to accommodate another stay for you soon. Thank you for choosing Park  Vue Inn.

Summary Heading: Family holiday on a budget, TICK!
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed at PVI last December. We had 2 rooms because we had 2 bookings, needing to extend our stay. Note, we make our bookings very early in the year; it is a very popular hotel all year round now. We chose this hotel on a personal recommendation from our family dentist. We were not disappointed. I did my homework reading reviews and chose a room upstairs and at the back as we have 3 teenagers who like their sleep! We initially had a room with 2 queen beds and a set of bunks. The kids unpacked their gear and pushed bags under the bunks. There was a sink outside the bathroom so people could clean their teeth, put makeup on etc. There was a large wardrobe to hang clothes, an iron too. With a small fridge, microwave and percolator we didn't require anything else. We
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy that your stay was great. We thank you for all of your kind words. It is always our pleasure to provide a home away from home. We hope to see again soon.

Summary: We stayed here on a recent trip to Disneyland.  You cannot beat the convenient location of this hotel for going to the Disney resorts.  You walk across the street and along the bus stops for about 5-10 minutes then you are at the central courtyard between Disneyland and California Adventure.  The evenings got a little cool so it was a super convenient walk to go back to the hotel to pick up some jackets then continue in the parks.  The rooms are clean, well-lit, and relatively spacious compared to other rooms we have stayed in.  The hot breakfast is decent so at least you can eat something quick before heading in to the parks, a huge time-saver.    Some have mentioned noisy rooms, which I admit brings the rating down 1-star.  The walls and ceilings are thin so you can hear quite
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your detail and kind words. We’re glad you had a great stay with us. We will continue to work hard at providing a great play to stay. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Being across the street from Disney was a real bonus.  We were able to come back to the hotel and have lunch faster (and cheaper) than Disney.  Hotel has lots of customer turnover (obviously since it is next to Disney) but accommodations were nice.  Let's face it if you are here you will spend as time as possible in the park and not the hotel.  The hotel is for sleeping only.  It provided clean room at a great price.  Will do it again.
Manager Response: I’m really glad you and your family had great stay with us and an even better visit to Disneyland. Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing our hotel! We strive to provide a home away from home and I’m happy you found everything you needed at our hotel. We look forward to your next visit with us.   Kind Regards,  Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and were impressed with the rooms. They were clean, fresh and roomy. The free breakfast was very good quality and plentiful despite many reviews saying otherwise. We found it a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for reviewing our property. Sounds like you had a great stay! Other guests have commented to me that the rooms in the back tend to be quieter. There is a more activity in the front of the property as folks make their way to the parks and kids express their excitment. Glad your family enjoyed our hotel. See you on your next visit.   Kind Regards,  Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: Cons Noisy rooms can hear everything, outside ,next door ,above.(horrible)!!! Walls and ceiling must be made of paper? And I stay in a lot of hotels all over the world.  Pros 1.Staff  are accommodating  2.Breakfast ok  3.Situated next to DL  I have had a better and cheaper stay at caravan parks So wont be back and certainly won't recommend!!!
Manager Response: Dear Tyler G.  Our hotel is older than most in the area and as the years go by we continue to upgrade, update and improve the quality of our rooms and overall property. Sounds like you may have been in a room with a connecting door to an adjoining room. There is some noise transfer between those room types. I would like to apologize for your less than satisfactory stay. Unfortunately it seems as though your pros outweigh your cons and you won’t be back. Should you have a change of heart feel free to call ahead and we will do our best to assign you to a room in a quitter area of the hotel.   Kind Regards,   Brian DeRose Director of Operations

Summary: First of all, this hotel is literally the closest to the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure; one cross walk away. Second of all, they have rooms perfect for a family with a couple of kids. Check out the rooms with the Queen size bed and Bunk beds for the kids. It's a fantastic and FUN idea! What a great deal for a family! Prices are reasonable. And the continental breakfast was more than a few notches up from some of the others on the street. Civil dinning area too; inside and an outside terrace. The staff was really nice and helpful. The rooms are a bit worn, but functional. Not the tidiest, but not disgusting! Very comfortable place to stay! Especially with kids. Fridge, Micro, coffee pot in room. Yeah!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your kind words. It is always our goal to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable home away from home. We thank you for choosing Park Vue Inn as there are many options out there, but yes our proximity to the parks is one of our best amenities. Some of our guests say it’s about 300 steps to the main gates.  Thank you again, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Located right across from Disneyland. Excellent complimentary breakfast so we found no need to go to the neighboring restaurants. Not plush, but very functional. Staff are friendly and helpful - they called our room and left messages asking if there was anything that they could help us out with, very nice.  Hotel is older so the rooms are not very sound proof and the bathrooms could use an upgrade. We could hear the footsteps of guests in the room above or running children on the second floor.  Perfect for little kids as we were able to head back to the hotel room very easily.  Beds are comfortable, rooms are clean, price is right.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We thank you for your kind words. We strive to provide a clean, confortable, and affordable, home away from home. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for choosing Park Vue .

Summary: Park Vue is not a luxury hotel. It does not afford wonderful views of the fireworks from Disneyland and the rooms are generally small for a larger family or party if one stays in the economy rooms.   So why the high rating?  Because we have stayed in several of the hotels here with more luxurious grounds . . . . and walked to the park in the early a.m. Our family of five with three children comes here to visit Disneyland. We are not here to see the surroundings outside or to shop or to go to other destinations.  Walking quickly to the park in the a.m. so we may be close to the front of the line is important to us. Peter Pan, Matterhorn Bobsleds, Dumbo, etc. do not have a Fast Pass and must be ridden in first hour of park openning to avoid lines.  We usually refuse lines of more
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to know that your stay was great. We will continue to work hard to provide a home away from home to all of our guests. We do have to say the fireworks view from our terrace is pretty nice. Thanks again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: If convenience is what you are after for your Disneyland trip...
Summary: We've always wanted to stay across the street from Disneyland, and now that our entire party can fend for themselves, the time was right. The location absolutely cannot be beat. The entire staff was very cordial -- after check-in, that is. I was a little concerned at first when the young man who checked us in was not as welcoming as one might expect. Not rude, just not very enthusiastic. After that, the entire staff was very, very pleasant.
